name: Relative position
description:
Figma结合slot，无论A元素选择何种组件，B始终与A保持预设的间距。即实现元素之间的相对定位效果。

只需替换slot为其他组件，即可快速实现下拉菜单，tooltips，对话框等交互效果。

———————————————————————————

Figma combines slot so that B always maintains A preset spacing with A, regardless of which component element A chooses. That is, to achieve the relative positioning effect between elements.


Simply replace slot with other components to quickly implement drop-down menus, tooltips, dialogs, and other interactive effects.
